title: OPL Split 2 Week 1 Tipping RESULTS!
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/opl_split_1_announce.jpg?itok=aX-Y1qp7

What a great first week of the OPL, there were some really close matches! We had 127 entries to the first tipping comp and only **2** picked all 8 and get to take hom 250RP!

Congratulations to;

ZeroZephyr
Begin AgainGod

Make sure you get your tips in for next week [here!](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports/PEyhKEYb-opl-split-2-week-2-tipping)

replies.body: congrats to the lucky winners, hope I can get the next week's one right. lol
